mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code_snippet (title, code, language, description, user_id, is_favorite, use_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{code}, #{language}, #{description}, #{userId}, #{isFavorite}, #{useCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE code_snippet SET title=#{title}, code=#{code}, language=#{language}, description=#{description}, user_id=#{userId}, is_favorite=#{isFavorite}, use_count=#{useCount}, create_time=#{createTime}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, code, language, description, user_id, is_favorite, use_count, create_time, update_time FROM code_snippet WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, code, language, description, user_id, is_favorite, use_count, create_time, update_time FROM code_snippet ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, code, language, description, user_id, is_favorite, use_count, create_time, update_time FROM code_snippet WHERE user_id=#{userId}
